::: {.callout-tip title="Cooking Tips"}
1. Before cooking, leave steak to stand for 10 mins at room temperature to Allow natural colour to return an odour to dissipate.
2. Once cooked, allow steak to rest on a warmed plate for 5 mins before serving.

:::
